After @IronMountain securely destroys your paper documents, the processed materials are transported to paper mills to be turned into pulp for recycled paper. This destruction process greatly reduces pollution, preserves landfill space, & saves trees, water & oil resources. https://t.co/UGEwPlLMVs
Volunteers from @Gleaners Community Food Bank are on-site at Comerica Bank Shred Day to collect food donations. https://t.co/ACzJ7TtzJC
Shred your private documents for FREE at Comerica Bank Shred Day! Join us today from 8am - 1 pm at our Livonia Operations Center. https://t.co/tPongqPCJ4
Major stock indexes saw positive gains this week, but experts are wary of how stable these upswings are. Learn more from our chief investment officer John Lynch in @Kiplinger: https://t.co/SIH4ojDWu3

A majority of Americans believe the nation is currently in a recession or that one is coming soon. Our chief economist @BillAdamsEcon explains in @ChiefInvOfficer why we aren't actually in one: https://t.co/jjCZ5xWu6f

With the highest inflation rates in 40 years and rising interest rates, it's tough to find a stable place to invest in stocks. Our chief investment officer John Lynch encourages investors to embrace this new reality. Read more in @USATODAY: https://t.co/OKWWeo9QIR
@Floppitypenguin For assistance, please call our Customer Contact Center at 1.800.266.3742 or visit a local banking center and a representative will be happy to help. Thank you for visiting.

Unemployment is lowering and wages are rising, but industries that boomed during the pandemic are facing difficulties. Check out the latest U.S. Economic Outlook from our chief economist @BillAdamsEcon to learn more: https://t.co/2wO7KcXdUf
